name: Escaparazzi
description:
Escape from the Paparazzi! 

Don't let them take too many pictures or you'll be lost! Avoid the cars and cross your fingers, let's hope you make it 'til the taxi arrives!

Follow me on twitter:
https://twitter.com/FelipeBudinich

Source Code available at:
http://gamejolt.com/games/arcade/escaparazzi/18248/ (click on "Download Game" to download a *.7z file)
https://github.com/FelipeBudinich/Escaparazzi (Clone the repository to have the latest version)
